languages.text: {n}Опустив глаза и стараясь на смотреть на Джай, Октавиана мрачно изрекает:{/n} "Моя власть — это власть, которую вручила мне организация. Следование правилам — плата за нее".
{n}Casting her eyes down and pointedly not looking at Jae, Octaviana grimly states,{/n} "My power is power that was given to me by the organisation. Following the rules is my payment for that power."
languages.original_text: {n}Опустив глаза и стараясь на смотреть на Джай, Октавиана мрачно изрекает:{/n} "Моя власть — это власть, которую вручила мне организация. Следование правилам — плата за нее".

traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}奥克塔维娜垂下了头，故意不看婕伊，面无表情地回答道。{/n}“我的力量是我的组织赐予我的。遵守组织的规则，就是我对这种力量最好的回报。”
languages.original_text: {n}Casting her eyes down and pointedly not looking at Jae, Octaviana grimly states,{/n} "My power is power that was given to me by the organisation. Following the rules is my payment for that power."

traits.locale_text: {n}奥克塔维娜垂下了头，故意不看婕伊，面无表情地回答道。{/n}“我的力量是我的组织赐予我的。遵守组织的规则，就是我对这种力量最好的回报。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}オクタヴィアナは目を伏せ、ジェイには目もくれず、不機嫌そうに言った。{/n}「私の力は組織から与えられた力だ。ルールに従うことは、その力の対価なんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Casting her eyes down and pointedly not looking at Jae, Octaviana grimly states,{/n} "My power is power that was given to me by the organisation. Following the rules is my payment for that power."

traits.locale_text: {n}オクタヴィアナは目を伏せ、ジェイには目もくれず、不機嫌そうに言った。{/n}「私の力は組織から与えられた力だ。ルールに従うことは、その力の対価なんだ」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Octaviana baja la mirada, evitando que sus ojos se cruzan con los de Jae, y declara:{/n} «Mi poder me ha sido otorgado por la organización. Seguir sus reglas es el precio que pago por ese poder».
languages.original_text: {n}Casting her eyes down and pointedly not looking at Jae, Octaviana grimly states,{/n} "My power is power that was given to me by the organisation. Following the rules is my payment for that power."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana baja la mirada, evitando que sus ojos se cruzan con los de Jae, y declara:{/n} «Mi poder me ha sido otorgado por la organización. Seguir sus reglas es el precio que pago por ese poder».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Octaviana baisse les yeux pour éviter de croiser le regard de Jae, puis déclare d'un ton sombre !{/n} « Le seul pouvoir que je détiens, c'est celui que m'a accordé l'organisation. En retour, je me dois d'observer ses règles. »
languages.original_text: {n}Casting her eyes down and pointedly not looking at Jae, Octaviana grimly states,{/n} "My power is power that was given to me by the organisation. Following the rules is my payment for that power."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana baisse les yeux pour éviter de croiser le regard de Jae, puis déclare d'un ton sombre !{/n} « Le seul pouvoir que je détiens, c'est celui que m'a accordé l'organisation. En retour, je me dois d'observer ses règles. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Octaviana wendet ihren Blick deutlich von Jae ab und äußert verbissen:{/n} "Meine Macht ist nur die Macht, die mir von der Organisation verliehen wurde. Indem ich die Regeln befolge, rechtfertige ich diese Macht."
languages.original_text: {n}Casting her eyes down and pointedly not looking at Jae, Octaviana grimly states,{/n} "My power is power that was given to me by the organisation. Following the rules is my payment for that power."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana wendet ihren Blick deutlich von Jae ab und äußert verbissen:{/n} "Meine Macht ist nur die Macht, die mir von der Organisation verliehen wurde. Indem ich die Regeln befolge, rechtfertige ich diese Macht."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Gözlerini yere indiren ve Jae'a kasıtlı olarak bakmayan Octaviana, tatsızca konuşuyor.{/n} "Benim gücüm, organizasyon tarafından bana verilen güçtür. Bu gücün bedeli de kurallara riayet etmektir."
languages.original_text: {n}Casting her eyes down and pointedly not looking at Jae, Octaviana grimly states,{/n} "My power is power that was given to me by the organisation. Following the rules is my payment for that power."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gözlerini yere indiren ve Jae'a kasıtlı olarak bakmayan Octaviana, tatsız bir tonla konuşuyor:{/n} "Benim gücüm, organizasyon tarafından bana verilen güçtür. Bu gücün bedeli de kurallara riayet etmektir."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04
